name.ja: <ruby>硫<rt>りゅう</rt></ruby><ruby>酸<rt>さん</rt></ruby>のたまった<ruby>落<rt>お</rt></ruby>とし<ruby>穴<rt>あな</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: When your opponent Normal Summons/Sets a monster from their hand, or after your opponent activates a Spell Card.

effect.en: Look at 1 face-down monster on your opponent's field. Then, if that monster's original DEF is 2000 or less, destroy it.
